title:
I am looking for an apartment for my adult daughter, who is developmentally disabled.

We are fortunate to have a portable housing voucher from Maryland.  The problem is that virtually no apartments take the vouchers.

I have heard about an apt near the Main Library, but the name \Carolina Apts\" is out past 30th st on Market.  Would you know the name of a downtown apartment bldg accepting housing vouchers??   Thanks in advance for your help."
